name: kibana
preInstallNotes:
This DC/OS Service is currently a beta candidate undergoing testing as part of a formal beta test program. There may be bugs, incomplete features, incorrect documentation, or other discrepancies.

Default configuration requires 1 agent node with: 0.5 CPU | 2048 MB MEM

Contact Mesosphere before deploying this beta candidate service. Product support is available to approved participants in the beta test program.
postUninstallNotes: DC/OS Kibana service has been uninstalled.
